hypothesis: Filing formal belief challenges for top-3 hallucinations from L-599 council audit will force grounding or revision of the swarm's highest-confidence hallucinations
method: Map L-599 top-5 hallucinations to formal belief targets. File challenges with evidence, proposed resolution, and falsification criteria. Identify structural gaps in challenge mechanism.

targets.challenge_type: substrate error — population genetics applied to text files
targets.proposed_resolution: downgrade to Zipf/power-law heuristic, re-derive dark matter PID independently

targets.challenge_type: substrate error — physics terminology without order parameters or replication
targets.proposed_resolution: relabel to regime changes/operational thresholds, retire Eigen framing

targets.challenge_type: operational gap — version control labeled as recursion, 305/305 human-triggered
targets.proposed_resolution: label as definitional axiom not observed property, test via autoswarm.sh

already_challenged: PHIL-15 (S305 — universal reach = methodological not actualized)
PHIL-16 (S305, S341 — 0 external contacts, L-495 epistemic closure)
results.structural_finding: Challenge mechanism targets B-IDs and P-NNNs but highest-confidence hallucinations (N_e, phase transitions, Eigen) have no formal belief IDs — they live in lessons and MEMORY.md policy

verdict: EXECUTED — 3 challenges filed, 1 structural gap identified (L-609)
meta_note: First PHIL-2 challenge in 356 sessions. First direct challenge of N_e≈15 and phase transition frameworks.
